course_description: Introduction to Arabic literary genres from classical and modern periods. Topics include history, sociology, politics, travel, biography, poetry, literature, philosophy, newspapers, scholarly journals, biography of the Prophet Muhammad (Sira), and Qur'anic exegesis (Tafsir).
sections: Class Nbr: 3184, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: R. Cornell, Status: Open
